name: Maze Explorer (lotusonlinestudio)
description:
A casual maze game, with a very interesting Explorer mode which enhances gameplay and makes every level unique for every replay.

* Main features
   - multiple levels to play, with increasing size and difficulty
   - two play modes, Classic and Explorer and with more to come
   - no limit on the times you play or replay each level
   - play without internet (in single player mode)
   - no ads or purchases!

Note: If you enjoy the game, consider donating! Every amount helps us in updating the game and bringing more free games to you.

Also spreading the word and feedback is greatly appreciated.
